column4: sure. they don't get tested anywhere near as much as normal updates, and if they break things they're not supported in here.
in all likely hood wouldnt it just make the app itself unstable? say if im using a backport version of VLC media player... its not gonna crash ubuntu is it?
I'd highly doubt it, but anything's possible.
I have gnome-shell, gnome-session-fallback, and gnome-panel installed and I still cant get a gnome 2 like environment
